00075     /**
00076      * @brief Returns array of carrier names.
00077      * @return array Carrier names. The index is the carrier ID. The value is the carrier name.
00078      */
00079     public static function getCarrierNames() {
00080         $carrierNames = array();
00081         
00082         foreach (self::$carriers as $key => $value) {
00083             $carrierNames[$key] = $value['name'];
00084         }
00085         
00086         return $carrierNames;
00087     }
00088     
00089     /**
00090      * @brief Returns carrier name for a given carrier ID.
00091      * @param int $carrierId The carrier ID.
00092      * @return string The carrier name on success, FALSE otherwise.
00093      */
00094     public static function getCarrierNameById($carrierId) {
00095         if (!self::isCarrierId($carrierId)) {
00096             trigger_error("Carrier ID {$carrierId} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00097             return false;
00098         }
00099         
00100         return self::$carriers[$carrierId]['name'];
00101     }
00102     
00103     /**
00104      * @brief Returns array of carrier domains.
00105      * @return array Carrier domains. The index is the carrier ID. The value is the carier domain.
00106      */
00107     public static function getCarrierDomains() {
00108         $carrierDomains = array();
00109         
00110         foreach (self::$carriers as $key => $value) {
00111             $carrierDomains[$key] = $value['domain'];
00112         }
00113         
00114         return $carrierDomains;
00115     }

00139      * @param int $carrierId The carrier ID to test.
00140      * @return bool Returns TRUE if carrier ID is valid, FALSE otherwise.

00142     public static function isCarrierId($carrierId) { return isset(self::$carriers[$carrierId]); }

00144     /**
00145      * @brief Sets the phone number.
00146      * 
00147      * @param string $phoneNumber The phone number.
00148      * @return bool Returns TRUE if phone number is valid, FALSE otherwise.
00149      * 
00150      * @code
00151      * $sms->setPhoneNumber('8003682669');
00152      * @endcode
00153      * 
00154      * @todo Add support for non US phone numbers.
00155      */
00156     public function setPhoneNumber($phoneNumber) {
00157         
00158         if (self::isPhoneNumber($phoneNumber)) {
00159             $this->phoneNumber = self::formatPhoneNumber($phoneNumber);
00160             return true;
00161         } else {
00162             // number is not valid
00163             trigger_error("Phone number {$phoneNumber} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00164             return false;
00165         }
00166     }
00167     
00168     /**
00169      * @brief Returns phone number.
00170      * @return string Phone number, NULL is returned if phone number is not set.
00171      */
00172     public function getPhoneNumber() { return $this->phoneNumber;}
00173     
00174     /**
00175      * @brief Determins if a phone number is valid.
00176      * @return bool Returns TRUE if phone number is valid, FALSE otherwise.
00177      * @param string $phoneNumber The phone number to test.
00178      */
00179     public static function isPhoneNumber($phoneNumber) {
00180         return (bool) self::formatPhoneNumber($phoneNumber);
00181     }
00182     
00183     /**
00184      * @brief Formats a phone number.
00185      * @return mixed On success returns formated phone number, FALSE otherwise.
00186      * @param string $phoneNumber The phone number to format.
00187      */
00188     public static function formatPhoneNumber($phoneNumber) {
00189         // remove non numeric characters
00190         $phoneNumber = preg_replace('/[^0-9]/', '', $phoneNumber);
00191         
00192         if (strlen($phoneNumber) == 11 && substr($phoneNumber, 0, 1) == 1) {
00193             // remove leading 1 on 11 digit numbers
00194             $phoneNumber = substr($phoneNumber, 1);
00195         }
00196         
00197         if (strlen($phoneNumber) == 10) {
00198             // 10 digit number
00199             return $phoneNumber;
00200         } else {
00201             // not valid
00202             return false;
00203         }
00204     }
00205     
00206     /**
00207      * @brief Sets the carrier ID.
00208      * 
00209      * @param int $carrierId The carrier ID.
00210      * @return bool Returns TRUE if carrier ID is valid, FALSE otherwise.
00211      */
00212     public function setCarrierId($carrierId) {
00213         $carrierId = (int) $carrierId;
00214         if (self::isCarrierId($carrierId)) {
00215             $this->carrierId = $carrierId;
00216             return true;
00217         } else {
00218             trigger_error("Carrier ID {$carrierId} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00219             return false;
00220         }
00221     }
00222

00224      * @brief Returns carrier ID.

00226      */ 
00227     public function getCarrierId() { return $this->carrierId; }

00233     public function getCarrierName() {
00234         return self::getCarrierNameById($this->carrierId);
00235     }

00244     
00245     /**
00246      * @brief Returns email.
00247      * @return string Email used to send SMS.
00248      * 
00249      * @ex 8003682669@tmomail.net
00250      */
00251     public function getEmail() {
00252         // check if phone number is set
00253         if (!$this->phoneNumber) {
00254             trigger_error("Phone number {$this->phoneNumber} cannot be null", E_USER_NOTICE);
00255             return false;
00256         }
00257         // check if carrier ID is set
00258         if (!$this->carrierId) {
00259             trigger_error("Carrier ID {$this->carrierId} cannot be null", E_USER_NOTICE);
00260             return false;
00261         }
00262         
00263         return $this->phoneNumber . '@' . self::getCarrierDomainById($this->carrierId);
00264     }
00265     
00266     /**
00267      * @brief Sets the subject.
00268      * 
00269      * @param string $subject The subject.
00270      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00271      */
00272     public function setSubject($subject) {
00273         $subject = trim($subject);
00274         $length = strlen($subject);
00275         if ($length > BOO_SMS_MAX_SUBJECT_LENGTH) {
00276             trigger_error("Subject length {$length} is greater than " . BOO_SMS_MAX_SUBJECT_LENGTH . ' characters, subject may be truncated', E_USER_NOTICE);
00277         }
00278         $this->subject = $subject;
00279         return true;
00280     }
00281     
00282     /**
00283      * @brief Returns subject.
00284      * @return string Returns the subject of the message.
00285      */
00286     public function getSubject() { return $this->subject; }
00287     
00288     /**
00289      * @brief Sets the body.
00290      *
00291      * @param string $body The body.
00292      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00293      */
00294     public function setBody($body) {
00295         $body = trim($body);
00296         $length = strlen($body);
00297         if ($length > BOO_SMS_MAX_BODY_LENGTH) {
00298             trigger_error("Body length {$length} is greater than " . BOO_SMS_MAX_BODY_LENGHT . ' characters, body may be truncated', E_USER_NOTICE);
00299         }
00300         $this->body = $body;
00301         return true;
00302     }
00303     
00304     /**
00305      * @brief Returns body.
00306      * @return string Returns the body of the message.
00307      */
00308     public function getBody() { return $this->body; }
00309     
00310     /**
00311      * @brief Sends the message.
00312      * Sends the message. Phone number and carrier ID must be set priory to calling the send method. This function requires <a href="http://www.swiftmailer.org/">Swift</a>.
00313      * 
00314      * @return bool Returns TRUE if send was successful, FALSE otherwise.
00315      * 
00316      * @code
00317      * $sms->send();
00318      * @endcode
00319      * 
00320      * @todo Add support for mail() function.
00321      */
00322     public function send() {
00323         if (!$this->isValid()) {
00324             trigger_error('Message is not valid', E_USER_WARNING);
00325             return false;
00326         }
00327         
00328         $smtp = new Swift_Connection_SMTP(BOO_SMTP_SERVER, BOO_SMTP_PORT, BOO_SMTP_ENC);
00329         $smtp->setUsername(BOO_SMTP_USERNAME);
00330         $smtp->setPassword(BOO_SMTP_PASSWORD);
00331         
00332         // start swift 
00333         $swift = new Swift($smtp);
00334         
00335         // create the message
00336         $message = new Swift_Message($this->subject, $this->body);
00337         
00338         // send
00339         $send = $swift->send($message, $this->getEmail(), BOO_SMS_EMAIL);
00340         $swift->disconnect();
00341         
00342         // check if it was sent successfully
00343         if ($send) {
00344             return true;
00345         } else {
00346             trigger_error('Send failed', E_USER_NOTICE);
00347             return false;
00348         }
00349     }
00350     
00351     /**
00352      * @breif Determins if the message is valid.
00353      * @return bool Returns TRUE if valid, FALSE otherwise.
00354      */
00355     public function isValid() {
00356         $result = true;
00357         // check if phone number is set
00358         if (!$this->phoneNumber) {
00359             trigger_error('Phone number cannot be null', E_USER_NOTICE);
00360             $result = $result && false;
00361         }
00362         // check if carrier ID is set
00363         if (!$this->carrierId) {
00364             trigger_error('Carrier ID cannot be null', E_USER_NOTICE);
00365             $result = $result && false;
00366         }
00367         
00368         // check if either subject, body, or both are set
00369         if(!$this->subject && !$this->body) {
00370             trigger_error('Either a subject or body is required', E_USER_NOTICE);
00371             $result = $result && false;
00372         }
00373         
00374         return $result;
00375     }
00376     
00377     /**
00378      * @brief Returns a HTML drop-down list of carriers.
00379      * 
00380      * @param bool $sticky[optional] If set to TRUE the drop down list will be sticky.
00381      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes to add to the HTML select.
00382      * @return string HTML drop-down list of all avalible carriers.
00383      * @since 2.0.0 Carrier IDs were renumbered.
00384      */
00385     public static function htmlCarrierSelect($sticky = true, array $attrs = array()) {
00386         $carrierNames = $this->getCarrierNames();
00387         $select = new Boo_Html_Select;
00388         $select->setSticky($sticky);
00389         $select->setData($carrierNames);
00390         $select->setTitle('Select Carrier');
00391         $select->applyAttrs($attrs);
00392         
00393         return $select;
00394     }
00395     
00396     
00397     /**
00398      * @brief Returns a HTML drop-down list of carriers.
00399      * 
00400      * This function is usefull for creating an HTML select of the avalible carriers. The value for each option will be set to the carrier ID.
00401      * If the selected value is 0 no carrier was chosen from the drop-down list.
00402      * 
00403      * This function is not dependent on Boo_Html_Select. If you have the entire Boo Framework installed 
00404      * you should use Boo_Sms::htmlCarrierSelect() instead.
00405      * 
00406      * @param bool $sticky[optional] If set to TRUE the drop down list will be sticky.
00407      * @return string HTML drop-down list of all avalible carriers.
00408      * @since 2.0.0 Carrier IDs were renumbered.
00409      * 
00410      * @code
00411      * <select name="carrier" id="carrier">
00412      * <option value="0">Select Carrier</option>
00413      * <option value="5">Alaska Communications</option>
00414      * <option value="10">Alltel</option>
00415      * ...
00416      * <option value="100">Virgin Mobile</option>
00417      * </select>
00418      * @endcode
00419      */
00420     public static function htmlCarrierSelect2($sticky = true) {
00421         $carrierNames = self::getCarrierNames();
00422         $tmp = "<select name=\"carrier\" id=\"carrier\">\n"
00423             . "<option value=\"0\">Select Carrier</option>\n";
00424         
00425         if (!empty($_POST) && isset($_POST['carrier']) && $sticky) {
00426             // postback and sticky
00427             foreach ($carrierNames as $key => $value) {
00428                 if ($key == $_POST['carrier']) {
00429                     // selected
00430                     $tmp .= "<option selected=\"selected\" value=\"{$key}\">" . $carrierNames[$key] . "</option>\n";
00431                 } else {
00432                     $tmp .= "<option value=\"{$key}\">" . $carrierNames[$key] . "</option>\n";
00433                 }
00434             }
00435         } else {
00436             // regular
00437             foreach ($carrierNames as $key => $value) {
00438                 $tmp .= "<option value=\"{$key}\">" . $carrierNames[$key] . "</option>\n";
00439             }
00440         }
00441         
00442         $tmp .= "</select>\n";
00443         return $tmp;
00444     }
